title: China 14-Day Reverse Repo Rate
description: China 14-Day Reverse Repo Rate was at 2.15 percent on Thursday November 10. 14-Day Reverse Repo Rate in China averaged 2.98 percent from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 6.05 percent in January of 2012 and a record low of 2.15 percent in September of 2022. The 14-day reverse repo is a type of short-term loan the central bank uses to increase liquidity and influence other rates in the banking system. This page includes a chart with historical data for China 14-Day Reverse Repo Rate.
author: People's Bank of China
